programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.sub-title: Will The Real Adolf Please Stand Up?
programme.desc: With camp security raised, Hogan and his men are desperate to smuggle top-secret German fortifications information to the Allies. The solution? Make liberal use of Carter's remarkable impersonation of Adolf Hitler.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Klink fails a physical and gets combat duty at the Russian front.

programme.title: Carol Burnett and Friends
programme.desc: In The Small Office, accountants systematically cram into the smallest office to get work done. Then, in The Clairvoyant. a department store salesman tells a writer his bleak future.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Potted Planter
programme.desc: A jealous husband is teased into a tizzy after being led on by his sister's lies.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A former KGB officer trying to defect finds himself trapped in a room with a bomb—and three hours before it detonates.

programme.title: The Alfred Hitchcock Hour
programme.sub-title: The Life Work Of Juan Diaz (s3, ep)
programme.desc: A dying Mexican frenetically looks for a way to provide for his poor family after his death.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: A political candidate hires Mannix to dig up dirt, but not on an opponent. He wants the gumshoe to dig up dirt on him.

programme.title: Cannon
programme.desc: A syndicate boss may just be next in line to be murdered when Cannon investigates a case involving a triple homicide.

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: Barnaby trails a jewel thief who's using call girls to distract his victims.

programme.title: Highway Patrol
programme.desc: A wrongly-convicted parolee becomes coldly determined to get revenge on his former business partner.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: Friday and Gannon track down a department store employee who stole $100,000 worth of merchandise in six months.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: The detectives search out the suppliers of stolen arms for paramilitary groups.

programme.title: My Three Sons
programme.desc: Robbie tries to get his own car to impress a new girl.

programme.title: Toon In With Me
programme.desc: "Bill and Toony explore nostalgic scents. "

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Beaver makes a new friend in Chuey Varella but the boy only speaks Spanish. So Beaver asks Eddie, who has taken Spanish, for some help but Eddie plays a joke on Beaver by feeding him a sentence in Spanish which ultimately insults Chuey.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: While watching Wally and his friends play baseball, Beaver is put in charge of looking after everyone's coats and watches. However, after the game is over Lumpy comes to claim his watch, but Beaver has no watch to give him.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Drowning Duck
programme.desc: Donald Briggs is an unscrupulous private investigator hired by Clyde Waters to uncover information about Marv Adams, his daughter's fiance. Briggs learns that Marv Adams' father was Ben Devereaux, who was convicted of murder 18 years ago.

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: When fighter Billy Leon is accused of murdering the reporter who made public his alleged steroid use, Matlock agrees to take the seemingly open-and-shut case.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Tibbs, Gillespie and Bubba pursue different leads in a bizarre murder case and the Chief realizes that the killer has plans for him.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A misunderstanding and plain stubborn pride causes a rift between the Walton grandparents

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Newly finds himself in a strange alliance with a professional killer as he tries to return to Dodge City with his prisoner (Jaeckel) before they are both killed by a trio of bounty hunters.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Little Joe's 19-year-old girlfriend is killed by a good samaritan, an explosives expert who had stopped to render aid to the woman's uncle after he suffers a stroke.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: The Queen-to-be of France hides out in North Fork.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Micah has an infamous outlaw, Charlie Gordo, in his jail waiting for the U.S. marshal from Denver to take Gordo to the Yuma prison for hanging. With the arrival of the stage, Micah finds that the lawman has been killed, and he has to look to his friends to defend the jail from Gordo's gang.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: "When his wagon falls down a cliff, Davey Baxter's mother is killed, and his arm is crushed. The doctor is unavailable, so Chris is forced to make the decision to amputate. This changes everything for Davey and the girl he plans to marry."

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: While on duty in a rural area, Reed and Malloy request the assistance of the DEA to build a case against the smug pilot of a light plane whom they suspect is involved in a drug smuggling operation.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: Malloy and Reed transport an unconscious 8-year-old boy to Rampart General Hospital and help him and his parents cope with the ordeal. Afterwards, they assist a child welfare hotline operator locate a 15-year-old girl who has intentionally overdosed on pills, and then race to find the boy they brought in earlier after he escapes from the hospital.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Trapper recover from an all night party. Henry gets a barbecue, and Hawkeye puts in a request for an incubator. The Quartermaster turns him down. They locate a Major with three incubators, but he won't let them have one.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: The arrival of a new batch of mail leaves Trapper depressed, and thinking of desertion, despite Hawkeye's efforts to dissuade him. Meanwhile, Hawkeye learns that he has successfully tricked Frank into buying stocks in a fictitious company, Pioneer Aviation.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Hawkeye and B.J. race against the clock to save a soldier from paralysis. B.J.'s harvesting an aorta from a dead soldier doesn't sit well with the soldier's friend.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Klinger discovers that his duties as company clerk include catering to the eccentric whims of the 4077th officers. Consequently, the unusual demands by Klinger's superiors leave little time to write a letter home to Toledo.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: A young man is accused of being the mysterious crook who's been robbing Wally's filling station. Andy and Barney try to determine his guilt or innocence in a variety of methods.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Opie doesn't like his new teacher, "Old Lady Crump," because she gives too much homework. Andy comments on the teacher, words which Opie twists in his retelling to Ms. Crump, and she is furious.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jed and Granny decide Jethro needs a job. They send him down to the bank to try to get work. While he is there, he runs into a magician, Marvo the Magnificent. After Marvo learns of his uncle’s many, many millions, he agrees to go home with Jethro. Marvo puts on a show for the Clampetts, and afterwards Jethro decides to become a magician.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Bored and looking for a project, Lisa becomes the head of the "Hooterville Human Humane Committee". She takes her cause to the extreme, declaring everything from duck hunting to selling chicken eggs off limits. Soon, the Douglases house is a zoo and the locals are ready to run her out of town.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan plans to detour the German bombers that normally attack London to a nearby Allied airbase.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: After detecting an information leak in the area of Stalag 13, the Germans replace Klink with a more efficient officer, who Hogan sets up to take the fall.

programme.title: Carol Burnett and Friends
programme.desc: In The Family, Eunice is furious when her vacation gets canceled. Then, in The Digs, a married couple decides to tell each other the truth about what really bugs them about the other person, and it doesn't end well.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Witless Witness
programme.desc: A judge is accused of murdering a government witness who planned to expose him as a crook.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Having had a little too much to drink the night before, a young couple wakes up in a strange house in a strange town called Centerville, a place where no one lives, the trees are props and the food is plastic.

programme.title: The Alfred Hitchcock Hour
programme.desc: A youthful London man heading for a weekend with his married mistress encounters a gentleman with oddly similar plans.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: A vagrant becomes the target of killers whenever he wears a patchwork coat.

programme.title: Cannon
programme.desc: When an heir of a millionaire who prefers to live like a hermit is discovered to be missing, Cannon in hired to investigate and uncovers a mysterious case of murder and embezzlement. But the case is hampered by the hermit's attorney.

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: A runaway housewife gets involved with a gang of thieves plotting an armored-car heist.

programme.title: Highway Patrol
programme.desc: Dan Mathews rushes to the scene when a woman kills a wanted thief.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: The problems of policemen's wives.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: The police go after a college student who has turned to murder.

programme.title: My Three Sons
programme.desc: Steve gives Mike advice on love after he announces his passion for his new girlfriend, Darlene.

programme.title: Toon In With Me
programme.desc: "Bill straps on skates to boogie through the history of roller rinks."

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Beaver becomes good friends with a classmate, Linda Dennison. However, their relationship is blown out of proportion by Beaver's classmates who begin to tease him and goad him into insulting Linda to prove that she isn't his girl.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Being Beaver's godmother, Aunt Martha sends him a gift of a ring that had once belonged to an uncle who was also named Theodore. June cautions Beaver that she doesn't want him taking it to school, but he sneaks off to school with it anyway. This leads to a confrontation between his peers that ends with him getting the ring stuck on his finger.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Sulky Girl
programme.desc: An impetuous niece who demands her trust fund be released comes to Mason for help. But it's her boyfriend who needs defending when he is charged with murdering her controlling uncle.

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: When a theatre critic is murdered after panning a play, Matlock is hired to defend the suspected murderer, Sam Spelvin, the play's writer as well as one of Matlock's childhood friends.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: The murder of well-respected man turns up a shocking secret about his family.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The disappearance of some valuable silver pieces throws suspicion on one of the Waltons

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Henry Decory is a schoolteacher who makes a strong statement for compulsory education for frontier children, while a stubborn father feels that books and education are a waste of time and tries to keep his son, Tommy, out of school.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: A bitter man who finds himself rich over night determines to get even with his adversaries by buying out their mortgages.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas' old Army pal settles in North Fork with his deaf daughter.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: An Englishman arrives with a custom-made rifle—and a plan to kill Lucas.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: "On his way to Fort David, wagon scout Duke Shannon rescues Sgt. Johnny Masters being sent to prison for twenty years; a man caught between two worlds. The world of his ancestors the Cherokee, and the world of his loyalty, the U.S. Army."

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: After completing a hazardous driving refresher course, Sgt. MacDonald assigns Malloy and Reed to a nighttime undercover bicycle patrol to test Officer Wells' idea on how to deal with a rash of residential car break-ins. The next day, they pull over a hippie with an obnoxious passenger, and then put their refreshed driving skills to the test when called to a burglary in progress at a new car showroom.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: Reed puts his reputation on the line when he decides to file a formal complaint against a fellow officer after witnessing him use excessive force. On patrol, he and Malloy search for suspects in two separate robberies.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: The O.R. is filled with more wounded than the unit can handle. Hawkeye does heart massage on a soldier, which saves his life, but he dies four hours later. Sidney Freedman drops in during the deluge, and is dragged into the fray by Hawkeye.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Trapper gets an ulcer and a ticket home. Unfortunately, his going-away party is spoiled by a new Army regulation, which forces him to stay.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Friction arises between B.J. and Winchester when they are asked to write an article for a prestigious medical journal on how they saved a soldier's life with a daring operation. Meanwhile, Hot Lips receives an eventful visit from Scully.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: A baby born to a Korean woman and an American GI is abandoned at the 4077th. Knowing that Amer-Asian children are often mistreated in Korean society, the troop sets about the frustrating task of finding a new home for the infant.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Aunt Bee, saddened by the death of a friend, is feeling old and tired. She stumbles across a medicine man's presentation and is intrigued by his bottle of elixir, which she believes to add pep to her life.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Mayberry is visited by an unusual family from the mountains.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: It is spring cleaning time, and Granny is trying to clean the mansion from top to bottom. Jed wants to stop her from doing this and thinks the way to do so is to get Granny out of Beverly Hills. He tells the family to make Granny think she is too tired and too old to work so hard, and Jethro and Elly lay it on a bit too heavy. But it works, and Granny does stop the cleaning.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.sub-title: Never Take Your Wife To A Convention
programme.desc: The only thing Oliver learns at a farming convention is how to get a hangover. He and Lisa meet up with Charlie, a former gangster-turned-farmer, and Wanda, his floozy dancer wife. The more Charlie talks about his farm, the more Oliver's convinced that his shady days are not in the past.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan tries to keep a French painting from ending up in Goering's art collection.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan captures a German general to trade for an American general who dislikes Hogan.

programme.title: Carol Burnett and Friends
programme.sub-title: Butler And The Maid, The / Mrs. Wiggins
programme.desc: In The Butler and the Maid, a married couple channels their frustration for each other through their butler and maid. Then, in Mrs. Wiggins, Mr. Tudball tries to teach Mrs. Wiggins how to use the intercom again.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Nebulous Nephew
programme.desc: A scam to swindle elderly relatives and a pang of conscience leads to a murder.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A man arrives in the Old West town of Happiness, Arizona, proclaiming he can revive the dead.

programme.title: The Alfred Hitchcock Hour
programme.desc: Dread stalks a ranch occupied by a farmer, his wife and a strange hired hand.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: The daughter of an ex-convict is the leading suspect in murders involving unrecovered loot from one of her father's robberies.

programme.title: Cannon
programme.desc: The reopening of the cold case of a salesgirl reveals that a bicycle she sold may be a clue to her death.

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: Barnaby looks into a 20-year-old case hoping to find clues to an elderly doctor's death.

programme.title: Highway Patrol
programme.desc: Dan Matthews investigates when a local beautician is blamed for a crime.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: Friday and Gannon recruit a woman cop to nab a burglar.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: Friday and Gannon investigate cases in a hospital emergency ward.

programme.title: My Three Sons
programme.desc: Chip and Ernie get lost in the woods looking for treasure.

programme.title: Toon In With Me
programme.desc: "We head back to the arcade to celebrate the game of pinball. Try not to tilt!"

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: When Eddie and some of his other friends brag about shaving, Wally decides it's time he try. After nicking his face, Ward tries to discourage him but this just leads Wally to continue to shave. When Ward catches him again, he scolds him right in front of Eddie which leads to Wally being made fun of.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Ward receives an antique pipe as a gift from Fred Rutherford and a curious Larry and Beaver decide to try it out. First they use coffee but then they try tobacco. When Ward discovers someone has used the pipe, he jumps to the conclusion that Wally is the culprit.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Silent Partner
programme.desc: Harry Bright and Chuck Clark were once best friends and business partners, until Margaret entered the picture. Margaret, a young woman on the make, entranced Chuck into marrying her. When Margaret is found shot to death, Harry is arrested.

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: When a woman who was planning to give her unborn baby to couple Howard and Amy has second thoughts and is soon found dead, the couple in question are the natural suspects. Matlock sets out to prove that someone else may have had a motive.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Virgil is delighted when Matthew his former partner from Philadelphia comes to visit. But he soon learns his friend has another purpose for coming to Sparta. Althea is uncomfortable because she and Matthew were romantically involved before she met Virgil and she realizes that he is unwilling to accept the fact that she chose Virgil over him. Meanwhile the F.B.I. enlist Sparta P.D.'s aid in hiding a witness.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: An itinerant worker and his young son stay with the Waltons, causing the son to want his father to give up life on the road

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: After her parents are killed on the prairie, Matt takes young orphan Bessie Sutherland to live with her Aunt Rachel. However, Matt finds that the girl's aunt is unwilling to take her in.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben confronts a former friend who has become a local strongman after monopolizing the freight business.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: The pangs of first love are painful for Mark: the object of his affections has eyes for another.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Banker Hamilton is closing up for the day when Rudy Gray persuades him to stay open for one more transaction—a withdrawal at gunpoint.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: "Hawks rides to the John Kaylor ranch to buy horses for the train but John just died. His widow Naomi refuses to sell the horses at the price John had promised. Naomi shows no sorrow over her husband's death, only wanting to sell the ranch."

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: Malloy and Reed's investigation of a fatal shooting in a hotel room hinges on the eyewitness account of a hopeless wino named Harry who is desperate to make a name for himself. Meanwhile, they investigate a report of a peeping tom at the home of an exotic dancer.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: It's Malloy's birthday, but he's consumed with anger over the thought his colleagues might have a plan to throw him a surprise party. On a busy patrol, he and Reed make an ironic traffic stop while responding to a burglary call at an antique store, deal with an extremely embarrassed theft victim at a lingerie store, investigate suspicious activity at a service station, use a creative approach to apprehend a serial jewelry store burglar and engage in a shootout inside the police station's parking garage.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: The camp is under fire and is swamped with wounded. They are being attacked by their own artillery in a frightening "friendly fire" incident. After Trapper and Margaret get trapped in the supply tent together, Frank's jealousy of Trapper drives him to propose to Margaret.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Camp activities include Henry's nervous delivery of a sex lecture, with Hawkeye and Trapper heckling, a Shirley Temple movie and a cookout.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Horrified by the gigantic size of his monthly bar tab at the officer's club, Hawkeye vows to give up booze for a week. Meanwhile, Winchester desperately tries to halt his sister's impending marriage to a man he considers unworthy of the Winchester heritage.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Colonel Potter turns crotchety when he catches the mumps, and his condition is worsened when Winchester gets the same disease and has to be quarantined with him. A temporary replacement surgeon, Newsome, is quickly brought into the 4077th and seems to be a gem in terms of both personality and ability.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: A tourist from England has to do chores to pay off a fine.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney uses his life savings of $300 to buy a car, which almost immediately begins to break down.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro decides to become a guru, which he believes will help him get girls, seeking the help of Mrs. Drysdale's guru, who is really a fake after money. Granny tries to bust him, but after the two have some moonshine, she ends up becoming the Great Mother, the Queen of Gurus, herself. She decides to go to India with the guru. Drysdale hears of this and calls the police to arrest the phony guru, but when the police do show they end up arresting Granny in her guru getup.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: A desperate Ralph Monroe joins a computer dating service to meet a husband. Oliver thinks it's a great idea since computers are always right. Lisa thinks they can't possibly take the place of romance, so she challenges Oliver to test their match-up on the electric brain.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan robs a bank to help pay for a map to German rocket installations.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.sub-title: Praise The Fuhrer And Pass The Ammunition
programme.desc: Hogan and his men create chaos during staged war games that a ruthless Nazi colonel has scheduled near Stalag 13, replacing the exercise's fake explosives with live ammunition.

programme.title: Carol Burnett and Friends
programme.sub-title: Mrs. Wiggins / Stop Grabbing My Jewels
programme.desc: In Mrs. Wiggins, Mr. Tudball plans a secret party for Mrs. Wiggins, who per usual, doesn't understand. Then, in Stop Grabbing My Jewels, Tim tries to steal a priceless diamond, with explosive results.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Deadly Verdict
programme.desc: Mason loses a case when Janice Barton is convicted of murdering her aunt and subsequently sentenced to death. After the verdict, Mason continues investigating to find the real killer among the old lady's heirs.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A heartless CEO completely automates his factory, laying off all of his employees.

programme.title: The Alfred Hitchcock Hour
programme.desc: Dopey McGregor makes his living carrying boxes to a medical college, unaware that they contain the remains of murder victims.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: When Mannix is hired to investigate a case of blackmail, the blackmailer turns up dead.

programme.title: Cannon
programme.desc: Cannon is hired to be a bodyguard for the daughter of a broker and his grandchildren, but is drawn in when the broker reveals that he believes his son in law is involved in a murder.

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: While on vacation, Betty meets a doctor who's being stalked by a trio of bikers.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Selma Plout tries to slap a lawsuit against Uncle Joe for a whiplash injury suffered in a fall from a hammock.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: When surveyors indicate that the Shady Rest expands to another county, Uncle Joe believes he has found a new tourist attraction and decides he'll make a profit.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts get a letter from Steve and Betty Jo Elliot of Hooterville with a picture of their baby. With all the great memories of Hooterville from their last trip, the family decides to go. Meanwhile, Jethro is still sporting his four star general's uniform, convinced he is an important figure. When he gets smart with Granny, she hits him with a skillet, so he heads to the base for breakfast.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jed and Howard Hewes are preparing to get their airport deal all wrapped up, and Drysdale decides to come visit the famous recluse of a billionaire. He brings along Jane, who is dressed in jeans and an old sweatshirt to look like she has the simple touch, and his three secretaries to sing "Howard Hughes, We Love You."

programme.title: Popeye and Pals
programme.sub-title: Leave Well Enough Alone, Females Is Fickle, Popeye The Sailor Meets Ali Baba’s Forty Thieves, Let’s Get Movin’, The House Builder-upper, Olive Oyl For President
programme.desc: "Popeye, saddened by the sight of dogs in a pet shop, buys them and releases them into the streets., Olive Oyl's pet goldfish jumps out of his bowl and falls overboard. Popeye dives after the missing pet and the chase is on!, Coast guardsman Popeye is ordered to stop Ali Baba and his 40 thieves from robbing desert villages., Olive Oyl is moving and Popeye shows up to help., When Olive Oyl's house burns down, firefighters Popeye and Wimpy decide to build a new house with disastrous results., Tired of political rhetoric, Olive lays out her platform."

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.sub-title: Duck Doctor, The Rookie Bear, Mouse For Sale, Senor Droopy, The Alley Cat, Cat And Duplicat
programme.desc: "Hunting in the woods, Tom wounds a duckling, little Quacker, who is doctored by Jerry., Barney Bear is an Army recruit going through basic training., Jerry gets painted white and sold by Tom as there is a new desire to get white mice., Droopy is a bullfighter looking to win the hand of a real life senorita if he can win the competition., An alley cat's romance is thwarted by a bulldog., Jerry is the victim of Tom and another cat but at first neither realizes that there is another cat, they think they are each other's reflection."

programme.title: Bugs Bunny and Friends
programme.sub-title: Hold The Lion, Please, Freeze Frame, What's Cookin' Doc?, Conrad The Sailor, My Bunny Lies Over The Sea, Each Dawn I Crow
programme.desc: "It seems the whole animal kingdom make fun of the lion as a has-been. Anxious to prove them wrong, the lion decides to try and catch Bugs. , The coyote orders a blizzard machine to cover the entire desert with snow after he finds out that Road Runners are easy to catch in the cold. , Bugs Bunny tries to change the minds of the Academy Awards voters when they award James Cagney an Oscar instead of him. , Daffy gives Conrad Cat a hard time on board the deck of a navy ship. Conrad Cat gives chase to Daffy. , In Scotland, Bugs gets into a fight with McCrory, and they decide to settle it over a game of golf. , It's about time for Elmer Fudd to behead the chicken on his farm. It's just too bad for him that the chicken gets wise to the plot, thus starting the cartoon chase."

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.sub-title: The Night Of The Colonel's Ghost
programme.desc: President Grant wants to go to Gibsonville to dedicate a statue. James West travels ahead to ensure it's safe for the President. He finds Gibsonville now is a ghost town experiencing an "epidemic" of broken necks.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: "Bitter alcoholic Stevenson Drake develops a dislike for the even tempered John Hollister, a fellow Southerner, when he learns he didn't fight for the Confederacy. He also is bothered by the friendliness between his wife and Hollister."

programme.title: The Big Valley
programme.desc: Senator and ex-gunman Jud Robson claims he is being stalked by enemies. Unfortunately, it seems that almost anyone can arouse his suspicions.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Farmer Jed Hackett (Harry Morgan) decides it's time for his three sons marry the women they brought back from Dodge City.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: An Italian immigrant and his son come to the Ponderosa. After spending some time with Hoss, the son decides he wants to give up the classical guitar to become a cowboy much to his father's chagrin.

programme.title: Rawhide
programme.desc: Jubal Wade has 1,600 head on this drive and demands to be trailboss, saying he'll keep Favor's crew if he stays on as ramrod.

programme.title: Have Gun, Will Travel
programme.desc: Accompanying a cavalry major on a mission to prevent a war by negotiating a treaty with an elusive Apache chief, Paladin must deal with soldiers who have caught gold fever.

programme.title: Wanted Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A violent religious cult cast lots and it falls upon a young woman to act as its angel of vengeance. Her mission is to murder Josh Randall in retaliation for his killing their cult leader's son in a shootout.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Sammy Davis Jr. stars as Tip Corey, son of a man allegedly murdered in North Fork.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: On the trail Len Richards and his brother, Ab, confront a Lucas McCain look-alike, Earl Bantry and his sidekick K.C. Peters, for slaughtering one of Richards' steers. Bantry kills Ab Richards, and Len wants Micah to arrest Lucas for the murder. More problems ensue because of this "evil twin."

programme.title: The Three Stooges
programme.sub-title: Brideless Groom***, Fuelin' Around, Scrambled Brains, Three Hams On Rye, Gents In A Jam, Outer Space Jitters
programme.desc: "To inherit a fortune, voice teacher Shemp must marry before six o'clock, but no girl will accept his proposal. Finally one of his repulsive students agrees to marry him, just in the nick of time. When the rest of the prospective brides hear about the inheritance, they show up at the ceremony and a free for all ensues. Shemp marries before the deadline, but wishes he was still a free man. , The Stooges are carpet layers working in the home of a scientist, Professor Sneed, who has invented a super rocket fuel. Larry is mistaken for the professor by foreign agents who kidnap the trio and take them to the country of Anemia where they are ordered to produce the rocket fuel or be executed. The boys come up with a concoction they try to pass of as the real stuff, but are exposed when the real professor and his daughter are also kidnapped. The Stooges help them escape, using their secret formula to fuel a jeep. , The Stooges accompany professor Jones on an expedition to Venus, where they discover that the Venusians are planning to conquer the earth with an army of zombies. When the boys learn that they're going to be turned into zombies, they escape. The scene changes to the Stooges apartment where we learn they are just telling a bedtime story to their kids (also played by the Stooges) while they wait for the baby sitter to arrive. When the baby sitter shows up, she looks like one of the zombies and the boys exit in a hurry. , Shemp is a sick man, suffering from hallucinations. His worst vision is that his ugly nurse Nora is actually beautiful. When Moe and Larry come to take him home from the sanitarium, they discover he's become engaged to Nora. On the way to Nora's apartment for the wedding, the boys get in a fight with a stranger who promises to get even with them if he ever sees them again. They arrive to finding Nora waiting for her father, who, when he arrives, turns out to be the man they just fought with. , The Stooges are stagehands who also have small parts in a big play. They quickly get on the bad side of the producer. First they fail to prevent a famous critic from sneaking into the audience. Then Shemp accidentally adds a potholder into a cake they bake as a prop. During the play the Stooges (as southern gentlemen) and the rest of the cast spit up feathers during what was supposed to be a serious scene. The critic thinks it's a hilarious satire and the boys are redeemed , Shemp's rich Uncle Phineas comes to visit the Stooges who are broke and about to be evicted. The boys convince their landlady Mrs. McGruder not to toss them out as Shemp is set to inherit a fortune. The boys also have trouble with a circus strongman after Shemp accidentally rips off his wife's dress. Uncle Phineas gets in the middle of the fight, and Mrs. McGruder ends it by knocking out the strongman. It turns out that Uncle Phineas and the landlady were childhood sweethearts and he marries her, leaving the Stooges out of the bucks once again. "

programme.title: Svengoolie
programme.desc: "When a college student inherits an old mansion he finds he has also inherited its residents--a bunch of slimy, hairy, fanged creatures who'll do anything for him...even kill."

programme.title: Batman
programme.sub-title: He Meets His Match, The Grisly Ghoul
programme.desc: Batman and Robin track a female student who joined Joker's gang, but Joker poisons her perfume to cover his tracks.

programme.title: Star Trek
programme.desc: Kirk, McCoy and Sulu are stranded on a barren planet where a mysterious woman attempts to kill them one at a time, while the Enterprise must travel halfway across the galaxy to rescue them.

programme.title: Kolchak: The Night Stalker
programme.desc: The first based on a Native American legend, a Diablero shaman spirit murders for jewels to pay back his debt and be released from his Earthly bonds.

programme.title: Lost in Space
programme.desc: The Space Pod lands on a planet that is inhabited by creatures who all look alike, yet aspire to be different. They capture the Robinsons and make duplicates of them with the objective of using the duplicates to fly the Jupiter II back to Earth.

programme.title: Voyage to the Bottom of the Sea
programme.desc: An extraterrestrial stranger tries to force Nelson to destroy the Pacific fleet with a nuclear missile.

programme.title: Land of the Giants
programme.desc: While fleeing the giants, Steve is exposed to hallucinogenic mushroom spores and becomes a raving paranoid who makes an alliance with Inspector Kobick to turn in his fellow Earthlings.

programme.title: The Time Tunnel
programme.desc: Planting a bomb in the time tunnel, a saboteur leads Tony and Doug on a chase through three epochs.

programme.title: The Invaders
programme.desc: The president of an electronics company fears aliens are kidnapping prominent minds -- and he's next!

programme.title: Thunderbirds
programme.desc: "The world's largest skyscraper "Thompson Tower" is opened amid great fan fare and excitement. Two miles high and containing 12 hotels, it has space for 10,000 cars. A fire breaking out in the basement of the building quickly turns into a major disaster and International Rescue a called begin trying to save the people trapped in the building"

programme.title: Saved by the Bell
programme.desc: Zack agrees to go on a date with Mr. Belding's niece, Penny, but when Kelly invites him to her birthday party, he sends Screech instead.

programme.title: Saved by the Bell
programme.desc: When her dad loses his job, Kelly chooses to cancel prom with Zack in order to save money.

programme.title: Saved by the Bell
programme.desc: Zack falls for a new student, only to discover that she's actually the new school nurse! Meanwhile, Slater is afraid of getting his flu shots.

programme.title: Saved by the Bell
programme.desc: The return of Bayside's radio station is a smash...except for Slater's boring sports broadcast. When he finds out no one likes it, he quits.

programme.title: Saved by the Bell
programme.desc: Zack sets up a 900-number hotline in his latest moneymaking scheme, with Lisa offering advice to the students of Bayside. Things go awry, however, when Zack takes over and offers terrible advice.

programme.title: Saved by the Bell
programme.desc: Jealous of Slater's skills in Driver's Education, Zack sabotages his driving test.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Fred antagonizes his friends with home movies of Pebbles, but in the process, he helps jail some thieves.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Fred wears a monster costume to advertise a horror movie.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: The razing of a famed honeymoon hotel reminds the Flintstones and the Rubbles how the couples met.

programme.title: The Jetsons
programme.desc: George says no to having Astro, a stray dog, but thinks a robot dog will be better for the family, so gets 'Lectronimo.

programme.title: The Brady Bunch
programme.desc: Carol has been acting mysteriously lately and Mike and Alice can't figure out what she's up to. It's discovered that Carol is writing an article about life with the Brady family for Tomorrow's Woman Magazine.

programme.title: The Brady Bunch
programme.desc: Jan receives a mysterious locket in the mail. Pretty soon a manhunt begins to find the sender, the only clue being the typewriter used to address the envelope drops its ‘y.’ When the locket mysteriously vanishes, Peter suggests they re-enact exactly what they were doing the night it disappeared.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: An upcoming father-son kite day has Beaver getting all excited when Ward agrees to participate with him. They do a great job building a kite together but when Gilbert talks Beaver into testing it out, the kite crashes and falls apart. This leaves Beaver with the duty to tell Ward just what happened.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Beaver buys a rundown mini-race car from Eddie and needs to find a set of wheels for it. Beaver decides to ask Penny Woods if he could have the wheels off her old doll buggy but finds himself in an awkward position: pushing a doll buggy down the street.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: When Shad Heller visits the Clampetts, Jed asks what happened to Shorty Kellems, but Shad doesn't know. Meanwhile, the Clampetts are having food stolen from the root cellar. They decide to investigate during the night and catch Shorty in the kitchen having a snack.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: To keep Shorty in line, Shad has built a cage. Shorty escapes but is soon captured and brought to his wedding rehearsal. The slippery Shorty, however, escapes again.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island
programme.sub-title: Erika Tiffany Smith To The Rescue
programme.desc: Erika Tiffany Smith lands on the island looking for a place to start a new resort, and find a new husband.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island
programme.desc: A crate containing coconuts is wrapped in an old Honolulu newspaper that says one of the castaways is being sought in a murder investigation.

programme.title: Mama's Family
programme.desc: Naomi wants to be a flight attendant.

programme.title: Mama's Family
programme.desc: Mama fills in for Vint as a mall Santa.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: Gopher's new love gets him fired; a married man traveling with his mistress sees neighbors; an executive is ordered to charm a widow.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Opie has his first crush, who ignores him. Barney steps in and tries to give him advice about women, which leads to Opie developing a crush on Thelma Lou.

programme.title: Collector's Call
programme.desc: "As the proud owner of more than 7000 toys and action figures--mostly in perfect condition-our collector Seth, needed somehere to store them and so he built Toyland - his backyard shed filled with toys from almost every toyline and every TV show from the 70's & 80's. Planet of the Apes figures, superheroes and the Six Million Dollar Man figures, are just a few of the toys Seth shows us today. Joining us at Toyland is John, a toy store owner who knows his toylines, and has the unenviable task of appraising Seth's entire collection and then trying to convince him to trade a relic from his past, for some forward thinking toys that John's hoping Seth can't refuse."

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Hawkeye is appointed temporary commander of the 4077th when Colonel Potter rushes off to Tokyo on a mysterious mission. While in command, Hawkeye's main problem is housing a large group of Korean refugees comprised mainly of rambunctious children who need medical care.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Tired of their constant complaints about the quality of recreational activities at the 4077th, Colonel Potter appoints Hawkeye and B.J. as the new morale officers. Winchester's morale has already reached a new peak: He's ecstatic about his operation on a wounded soldier, Sheridan, which saved the boy's leg, leaving only "negligible" side effects—less use of his right hand. However, the soldier was a concert pianist before the war.

programme.title: All in the Family
programme.desc: Lionel has a fight with his parents and moves into the Bunker's house for a night.

programme.title: All in the Family
programme.desc: The rising tide of feminism confronts Archie on all sides when Edith joins a women's group and Irene lands a job alongside him on the loading dock.

programme.title: All in the Family
programme.desc: Gloria is shocked when Mike announces that he doesn't plan on having children.

programme.title: All in the Family
programme.desc: After an accident on the loading dock brings Archie within inches of his life,he suddenly becomes a devout-if somewhat hypocritical- churchgoer.

programme.title: Carol Burnett and Friends
programme.sub-title: Guests James Coco, Nancy Walker, And Rock Hudson
programme.desc: In The Blind Date, James binges to calm his nerves before meeting a blind date. Then, in The Baby Sitter, an uptight Carol is reluctant to leave her child with the babysitter for the first time. Next, in Sisters, Carol takes Vicki on as her sister, hoping to teach her self-respect. Finally, Carol and the gang perform classic TV commercial parodies, including Joe Nimith, Oven Cleaner, Margarine, Shodies Tissue, Gotcha, and Geritone.

programme.title: Carol Burnett and Friends
programme.desc: In The Family, Carol plays Eunice, who is determined to star in a local production, despite lacking the talent of her drama teacher.

programme.title: The Dick Van Dyke Show
programme.desc: Rob tells his co-workers about the day he and Laura met a prisoner.

programme.title: The Dick Van Dyke Show
programme.sub-title: The Alan Brady Show Goes To Jail: Part 2
programme.desc: "The Alan Brady Show" perform in prison, and Rob accidently ends up behind bars.

programme.title: The Honeymooners
programme.desc: Ralph captures two thugs that followed him home after he witnessed a hold-up.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A singer searches for an authentic folk song.

programme.title: The Alfred Hitchcock Hour
programme.desc: An outsider forms a wobbly coalition with an insatiable woman bent on murdering her rich husband.

programme.title: The Fugitive
programme.desc: Kimble's sister Donna summons him home with a possible break in the case: a letter from James Eckhardt, a former U.S. Army captain who also saw the one-armed man fleeing from the Kimble's house on the night of Helen's murder. Kimble meets with Eckhardt, w

programme.title: Mission: Impossible
programme.desc: In the country of Valeria, the IMF must ensure that the corrupt nationalist party's rigged voting machine doesn't give them the election.

programme.title: Peter Gunn
programme.desc: An attempt on Lt. Jacoby's life is made after he receives a mysterious phone call.

programme.title: Peter Gunn
programme.desc: Wealthy invalid Louise Reardon has an attempt made on her life and Gunn is hired to find her Aide, Scully.

programme.title: Highway Patrol
programme.desc: Dan Matthews uses taxi drivers as bait for criminals.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: The police zero in on a rat: a forger, bigamist and thief who even robs from the blind.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: Friday investigates the junior high drug scene.

programme.title: My Three Sons
programme.sub-title: The End Of The You Know What
programme.desc: After hearing that the world may end in one week, Chip and Ernie are left wondering what to do with the time they have left.

programme.title: Toon In With Me
programme.desc: "Bill and Toony explore amazing collections."

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Wally needs a new suit for an upcoming dance and he convinces his parents that he's old enough to pick out his own clothes. So he and Beaver go down to the shop and pick out the loudest, cheapest plaid suit in the entire shop.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: A school play has Beaver and his classmates assigned parts and Beaver is assigned the role of a canary. However, he doesn't seem to be graceful enough to fly around like a bird. To make matters worse, on the night of the play, Ward's words of encouragement lead to Beaver coming down with a case of stage fright.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Angry Mourner
programme.desc: Carla Adrian is having trouble fending off amorous neighbor Mark Cushing. When another neighbor hears a shot and a woman's scream in Mark Cushing's cabin, it's not long before the police discover Cushing's dead body and arrest Mrs. Belle Adrian.

programme.title: Matlock
programme.sub-title: The Man Of The Year (s5, ep)
programme.desc: Matlock is all set to be honored as the man of the year, but when his car breaks down and he's forced to ask his housekeeper for a ride, a simple 20-minute trip turns into a flat tire, hostage situation and afternoon in jail.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Sweet risks his life to prove that the Sheriff of a neighboring county is guilty of the racially motivated murder of a young man that Sweet was friends with in high school.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A local "Robin Hood"" who steals from the ""haves"" and gives to the ""have-nots"" causes a crisis of conscience for John-Boy "

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Matt Dillon is sentenced to life imprisonment for shooting a fugitive in the town of Bedrock.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Hoss falls under the spell of a beautiful shady lady from San Francisco and asks her to be his wife, believing his love can change her even after she tries to seduce his brother, Adam.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Mark stop on the way to the county fair to deliver a message to Micah, who is on the trail escorting a prisoner scheduled to be hanged. Mark and Lucas recognize the prisoner, Mr. Renolds, as someone who saved Mark's life from a snake bite a few years back.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A professional card player, John Keeler, has set up business in North Fork, but local Jesse Phillips claims that this tinhorn is a cheat. Lucas starts playing poker with Keeler to draw him out.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: "While riding through the desert plains, Duke and Charlie come across a sheriff as he is about to die of a heart attack and his female prisoner, Lily Legend, a childhood sweetheart of Duke who the sheriff is taking to be hanged for murder."

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: Malloy and Reed suspect that a well-armed immigrant tailor who claims to be defending his establishment from burglars is actually plotting a murder. In the meantime, they deal with a drunken traveling businessman who passes out in a bar girl's car.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: Malloy and Reed investigate an interstate bounty hunter who has an invalid gun permit and questionable tactics. Meanwhile, they deal with an elderly man who strongly dislikes hippies, and a frustrated wife who desperately wants to receive a traffic ticket.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Irritated that the 4077th is planning a "surprise" party for him, Hawkeye volunteers to go to the aid of a wounded surgeon at the front. An additional irritant to Hawkeye is the arrival of Dr. Borelli, a wisecracking medical advisor with whom he habitually disagrees.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Klinger redecorates his quarters, but the resultant ridicule he receives drives him to new heights in his efforts to get out of the Army. Meanwhile, the doctors are perplexed by the reaction of an Asian-American war hero who tries to kill himself.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: The 4077th can't escape the Korean War, even in its dreams. Exhausted after two days without sleep, members of the 4077th steal away for catnaps and experience dreams that reveal their fears, yearnings and frustrations.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: B.J. finds himself attracted to a famous war correspondent, Aggie O'Shea, who has fallen in love with him.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney believes that Andy should be getting married.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Visiting officials take pause when they visit Mayberry and find that the courthouse is full of dogs.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: After their careers don’t exactly work out well, Jethro, after unsuccessfully trying to launch himself into space, and Miss Jane, after quitting at the bank, decide to launch a career in folk music. But the two learn that what they actually had in mind isn't anywhere in their future and end up deciding to return to their original plans.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: To his chagrin, Oliver learns he shares his birthday with Arnold Ziffle. While Oliver's convinced he's going to be feted with a surprise party, he refuses to spread the joy by getting a gift for the pig.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan resents having a lady scientist in charge of a mission to destroy a lab.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Newkirk gets drafted into the German army while working on Hogan's plan to sabotage a ammunition factory.

programme.title: Carol Burnett and Friends
programme.desc: In Went with the Wind, Carol and the gang parody the classic "Gone with the Wind", with Carol playing Scarlet O'Hara.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Shifty Shoebox
programme.desc: Robbery, embezzlement and a coverup at a trucking company end in the murder of one of the owners.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Two people in a remote cabin find signs of an extraterrestrial.

programme.title: The Alfred Hitchcock Hour
programme.desc: When two missionaries arrive at a remote medical mission in the Indian jungle, jealousy leads to murder and a coverup.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.sub-title: The Girl In The Polka Dot Dress
programme.desc: Mannix scoffs at a psychic's tale about a woman in danger. Then the prophecy comes true.

programme.title: Cannon
programme.desc: An accountant wants to teach the world a lesson about the production of a deadly nerve gas when he steals a can of the substance.

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: A girl begins to see future fatal accidents while exploring the occult.

programme.title: Highway Patrol
programme.desc: Two hoodlums attempt to murder their former cellmate by withholding his insulin.
